about_the_game:
You have been waiting for a meeting with a lustful tribe for a long time!

Stop and enjoy the simple, rewarding gameplay. You are alone with the beauty. She gets excited by your touch and gradually undresses. The dream has come true!

A whole set of fantasy girls from a simple villager to a wayward aristocrat - win their love!

Develop and develop your skills: only the strong in spirit will get all the girls. Your arms should also be strong.

The game offers three modes:
♥ Progress. You are moving forward, pumping your own strengths, tools and skills. Sooner or later, another beauty will succumb to your charms and you will get her heart.
♥ Limitless. You know exactly what, and most importantly, who you want. Now your dream girl won't leave until YOU want it.
♥ Gallery. Enjoy your trophy girls in any order you like.

The game may contain:

(expand!)

♥ Lovely girls: they are just waiting for you to come to their inner world
♥ Consensual petting, rough sex and vice versa
♥ Girls make sounds during mating season
♥ Tons of achievements. At least 1 per minute. I hope
♥ Music for both your body and soul
♥ Trophy room: enjoy every seduced girl any time you want
♥ RPG elements: seduce harder, better, faster, stronger!
♥ Three game modes: progress, limitless, gallery

It is game made by couple of hentai loving people for another hentai fans. Chill)

Please support indie developers and have fun playing this game!

content_descriptors.notes: Happy joyful sex with lots of girls!

name: Lustful Tribe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: OS: WINDOWS® 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)

short_description: The fun and sexy video game: get the love of the hentai girls through thorough clicks! Get they enjoynment in the form of new poses and reactions. If you get too excited over some of the girls - you can stop at her and replay it. Don't forget to get the tons of achivements! Play now!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese
